Hyomin Han

Hi! I am a Master's student in the Learning Sciences program atNorthwestern University, where I explore the intersection of music education, artificial intelligence, and tangible interaction design.

My research focuses on developing innovative approaches to music education that combine the adaptability of AI with the intuitive nature of physical interfaces. I investigate how these technologies can work together to create personalized learning experiences that make music education more accessible, engaging, and effective for learners of all backgrounds.

Opportunities to Support Communal Experiences of Deaf and Hard-of-Hearing People in Live Popular Music ConcertsGROUP '23
